pr_title: Issue 5002: Delete scope api with delete streams flag

timeline.message:
Issue 5002: Delete scope api with delete streams flag

Signed-off-by: Shivesh Ranjan <shivesh.ranjan@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: If a "seal" or "deleteStream" operation fails for a single stream should'nt we continue deleting the other streams?
timeline.author: shrids

replies.bodyText:
Well, even if we opportunistically delete other streams, the scope can not be deleted if a single stream's seal and delete failed. So we should throw the error back to the user so that they can decide on how to handle it.
a subsequent attempt to delete the scope using this api will iterate over all available streams and attemp to delete them.
replies.author: shiveshr
